data.lyric:
[ti:8 Out Of 10 (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]8 Out Of 10 (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.12]Producer：Boi 1da/Jahan Sweet/OB
[00:00.25]Drake：
[00:00.38]Too rich for who
[00:01.26]Y'all just got rich again
[00:03.28]Who grips the mic and likes to kill they friends
[00:05.90]I've never been the type to make amends
[00:08.73]If sh*t was at a eight we like to we like to we like to
[00:13.46]Yeah if sh*t was at a eight we like to make it ten
[00:17.42]1da sent this in I'm goin' up all the way
[00:20.17]I don't like to talk when there's nothin' else left to say true
[00:22.88]Drake：
[00:23.11]Drizzy 'bout to drop the game is in disarray
[00:25.79]I'd tell you hear me out but we both know end of the day
[00:28.22]Your sister is pressin' play your trainer is pressin' play
[00:31.07]Your wifey your wifey your wifey your wifey true
[00:34.19]Drake：
[00:34.37]I gotta breathe in real deep when I catch an attitude
[00:37.52]I got a whole 'nother level that I can tap into
[00:40.40]Max said they only blessed when they attached to you
[00:42.71]The only deadbeats is whatever beats I been rappin' to true
[00:46.54]And the product is still the best though
[00:48.81]It's only good in my city because I said so
[00:51.81]Just to fit the estate man I had to Copperfield like presto
[00:55.60]Voilà tada true
[00:56.66]Drake：
[00:57.12]Never a matter of "could I" or "should I"
[00:59.54]Kiss my son on the forehead then kiss your a** goodbye
[01:02.71]As luck would have it I've settled into my role as the good guy
[01:06.62]I guess luck is on your side
[01:09.47]I guess luck is on your side
[01:11.58]All sevens no sixes rest easy get some shut eye
[01:17.83]Hold on hold up but I
[01:19.94]Drake：
[01:20.82]Miss makin' 'em pay
[01:22.28]Helipad from Will Smith crib straight to the stage
[01:25.12]Three Forum shows but I played Staples today
[01:27.83]The neighborhood is smokey y'all stay safe in this place true
[01:30.52]Drake：
[01:30.72]Drizzy 'bout to drop the game is in disarray
[01:33.29]I'd tell you hear me out but we both know end of the day
[01:35.90]Your n**gas is pressin' play your nanny is pressin' play
[01:38.75]Your wifey your wifey your wifey your wifey true
[01:41.93]Drake：
[01:42.25]Had to go and hit reset now we here
[01:45.25]I been on top for three sets of three years
[01:48.18]I can't be around the n**gas you minglin' with
[01:50.93]I can't fly if I can't sit on the wing of that sh*t true
[01:54.12]I try to pay it less mind
[01:55.69]They been keepin' tabs on me like I'm payin' next time
[01:58.39]I think I sense a little fear from the other side
[02:01.36]White vans parked across the street real subtle guys true
[02:04.43]Drake：
[02:04.61]Yeah never a matter of "could I" or "should I"
[02:07.33]Kiss my mom on the forehead then kiss your a** goodbye
[02:10.42]As luck would have it I've settled into my role as the good guy
[02:14.15]I guess luck is on your side
[02:17.20]I guess luck is on your side
[02:19.30]All sevens no sixes rest easy get some shut eye
[02:25.61]Hold on hold up but I
[02:27.59]Plies：
[02:28.34]Hahaha I can't argue with you
[02:32.74]No you mad
[02:37.68]Look at you you mad
[02:41.72]You big mad
[02:44.20]Haheheh
[02:46.76]I'm happy
[02:48.79]Leave me alone
[02:53.03]I just want some money a lot of money
[02:59.67]I don't get paid to argue with you
[03:04.01]No
[03:05.68]Who are you
[03:07.72]You ain't nobody
[03:14.02]You mad
data.trans:
[ti:8 Out Of 10 (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.38]谁太有钱了
[00:01.26]你们又有钱了
[00:03.28]是谁握着麦克风 好像要杀了他们的朋友似的
[00:05.90]我从来都不是那种会赔罪的人
[00:08.73]如果这首歌是在八度 我们希望 我们希望 我们希望
[00:13.46]如果这首歌是在八度 我们希望把它提高到十度
[00:17.42]Boi-1da制作了这首歌 我要一路飙高音
[00:20.17]我不喜欢在无话可说的时候说话 真的
[00:22.88]//
[00:23.11]Drake要准备跳舞了 游戏陷入混乱
[00:25.79]我会告诉你 听我说 但我们都知道这一天结束的时候
[00:28.22]你的姐妹在装腔作势 你的教练在装腔作势
[00:31.07]你的妻子 你的妻子 你的妻子 你的妻子 真的
[00:34.19]//
[00:34.37]我得深深地吸一口气 当我有了自己的看法时
[00:37.52]我的音乐达到了一个完全不一样的水准
[00:40.40]麦克斯说只有他们青睐你时 他们才会祝福你
[00:42.71]唯一的死节拍是我一直想要的节奏 真的
[00:46.54]那个产品一直都是最好的
[00:48.81]它只在我的城市得到好评 因为我说了
[00:51.81]为了适应那些房地产商人 我必须像魔术大师科波菲尔一样
[00:55.60]就这样 真的
[00:56.66]//
[00:57.12]从来没有什么 我可不可以或者我应不应该
[00:59.54]亲我儿子的额头 然后亲吻你的翘臀 再见
[01:02.71]幸运的是 我已经习惯于扮演好人的角色
[01:06.62]我想运气是站在你这边的
[01:09.47]我想运气是站在你这边的
[01:11.58]全是7 没有6 大放宽心 闭一会儿眼睛
[01:17.83]继续 坚持 但我
[01:19.94]//
[01:20.82]想念那些有收入的日子
[01:22.28]坐飞机从Will Smith的房子里直接飞向舞台
[01:25.12]在Forum上有三场演出 但我今天只演唱Staples
[01:27.83]这附近雾气很浓 你们待在这里很安全
[01:30.52]//
[01:30.72]Drake要准备跳舞了 游戏陷入混乱
[01:33.29]我会告诉你 听我说 但我们都知道这一天结束的时候
[01:35.90]你的姐妹在装腔作势 你的教练在装腔作势 play
[01:38.75]你的妻子 你的妻子 你的妻子 你的妻子 真的
[01:41.93]//
[01:42.25]必须要点击重置了 现在 我们做了
[01:45.25]我已经连续三年位居榜首
[01:48.18]我不能跟你来往的那些人混
[01:50.93]如果我不坐在音乐的翅膀上 我就无法飞翔 真的 
[01:54.12]我试着少花点心思
[01:55.69]他们一直在监视我 好像下次应该我付钱一样
[01:58.39]我想我从另一面感觉到了一点恐惧
[02:01.36]停在街对面的白色面包车 真是狡猾的家伙 真的 
[02:04.43]//
[02:04.61]从来没有什么 我可不可以或者我应不应该
[02:07.33]亲我儿子的额头 然后亲吻你的翘臀 再见
[02:10.42]幸运的是 我已经习惯于扮演好人的角色
[02:14.15]我想运气是站在你这边的
[02:17.20]我想运气是站在你这边的
[02:19.30]全是7 没有6 大放宽心 闭一会儿眼睛
[02:25.61]继续 坚持 但我
[02:27.59]//
[02:28.34]我不能和你争论
[02:32.74]不 你疯了
[02:37.68]看看你 你疯了
[02:41.72]你彻底疯了
[02:44.20]//
[02:46.76]我很开心
[02:48.79]别管我
[02:53.03]我只是想要些钱 很多的钱
[02:59.67]我跟你争论又没有钱拿
[03:04.01]不
[03:05.68]你是谁
[03:07.72]谁也不是
[03:14.02]你疯了
